website_summaries.verdict: If your child is not a wild sleeper, you'll love this comfortable, easy-to-install bumper system.
pros: just place underneath the fitted sheet
Made from nontoxic foam and covered with a water-resistant cover
Designed so child is subconsciously cued to shift toward middle when they bump into it
cons: You know your child best – parents of active sleepers or who have their children in bunk or loft beds may wish to consider other options

customer_reviews.title: Nice but ineffective
customer_reviews.text: The bumpers are a nice quality product at a decent price, however they proved ineffective for our 2 1/2 year old. Her first night in her big girl bed, she fell out twice. The bumpers were in place correctly, but she managed to roll over them and fall on the ground twice. Luckily I set up several pillows and blankets on the floor just in case, to break the fall.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Haywood (Amazon Customer)

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in these, don't waste your $$ and go with a different brand. After 24 hours they have yet to fully expand from the tight roll they were in to fit into packaging box. They are creased and misshaped. It's unfortunate my husband tore up the box for recycling because I would send them back and get a different brand. They are much smaller than previous bumpers we have purchased (unfortunately those were not available). Really annoyed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Off-Gassing Fumes! (But great product)
customer_reviews.text: Horrible odor from off-gassing! It would otherwise be a decent product, but the stench is so chemical laden that i removed the bumpers from my son's room. ***** The seller reached out to me, refunded the money, and told me to keep the bumper. It eventually stopped smelling and we really like the product. My son has not fallen out once and the bumper stays pretty much in the same spot. ***update*** bumpers are still stating put two years later. I like the removable covers on it too. We had one night where my son picked up a stomach bug. The nylon covers kept all the gross stuff off the bumpers and easily cleaned up in the washing machine!
customer_reviews.author: JayJayKitt

customer_reviews.title: I can finally sleep at night
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old has been going through her clingy stage and refuses to sleep in her crib. She only wants to sleep on the full mattress in her room and demands that I sleep next to her. She rolls a lot in her sleep and has fallen off the bed, so I've been sleeping with her, out of fear, but it's not pleasant. I ordered these and last night I was able to leave her alone on the bed and sleep in my room agai. They are sturdy, safe, and don't move (even with my little roller baby). I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ami

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t we always have these?
customer_reviews.text: Finally! It’s such a simple idea and so much better than the old way of rearranging furniture so the bed was against the wall and then putting up an ugly and inconvenient bed rail. It’s fine for an adult to sit on for story time and lullabies because it bounces right back. It’s effective at keeping little ones from falling out of bed, but doesn’t require special bedding and doesn’t look bad once the bed is made. I also anticipate this being useful for travel. It will not only keep the small ones off the hotel floor, but will be a perfect divider when kids need to share a bed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Useless product
customer_reviews.text: These do not stay in place and slide off the edge of the bed, doing nothing to keep my child secure in his bed. I saw another reviewed give this product 5 stars and say they use safety pins to secure it. If that qualifies as a 5 star review then I could have recycled our pool noodle and used some duct tape to secure it to the bed and invented the product of the year (not to mention saved myself 40 bucks.) I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: GNL

customer_reviews.title: If you have a roller get something more sturdy. My son fell out of bed the first ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have a roller get something more sturdy. My son fell out of bed the first night with these.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie

customer_reviews.title: So far so good for my 2 1/2 year old
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered a pair of these and then ordered another single one for the footbase of my toddler’s twin bed. I like how tall they are as he is a wild sleeper. They do seem to move a little u see the sheet and I have to make sure to adjust it daily, my only complaint. Aside from that, it’s easy for him to climb over when he wants to get back into his bed. I do feel more comfortable with him having these than just using a pool noodle as other people have suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Vivianna Graham

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect. Well made, and does its job perfectly. The design and details are awesome, like the rubberized grips to keep it in place. I ordered a second set a week later for my other kid. My only suggestion would be to somehow label the box to warn customers that it will take 2 hours to expand out of the box when brand new. Daddy took a bit of time to convert the crib into a bed and was finally ready at bedtime only to unbox the items and see that it takes 2 hours until these fully expand. Luckily they expanded fine under the sheets and we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: I placed them under the fitted sheet, however, ...
customer_reviews.text: I placed them under the fitted sheet, however, they do not stay put, as the child moves and pushes against it, they push out the sheet and slide off onto floor. Does not grip at all. You will need to use deep pocket sheets, find the right size stay put sheet straps that install from under the mattress, need a couple across the bed area where you are placing these bumpers to hold the sheets tight to keep from opening up on the sides of the bed and the bumpers from sliding out, I read about using safety pins, but I am not sure they are secure enough or safe. a lot of work, rails are easier.
customer_reviews.author: Filomena Aur

customer_reviews.title: ... reading the reviews I thought I had found the perfect product for our active night sleeper
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I thought I had found the perfect product for our active night sleeper, however the foam pads do not look like this picture as advertised it's lacking the height. There is no way an active sleeper will not roll out of this. You need to buy two and stack them on top of each other to get it to look like the picture advertise. I do think this product will be good for not so active sleepers or smaller kids. I would recommend offering different sizes in heights to accommodate the ninjas at night.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two sets (for 2 beds) and love them. In fact, when I lay in bed with my kid and fall asleep and she pushes me up against the bumper, it remains where I installed it. They have little rubber dots all over the outside case that insures it does not slip. Very comfortable and very high-quality. I recommend for any parent. Easy to take on vacations too. On a full size bed, it leaves almost a full 3 feet from inside to inside for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: brett

customer_reviews.title: Useful, easy, semi-portable
customer_reviews.text: I think traditional child bed rails are a huge eye sore and was happy to have found this wonderful alternative. My daughter used hers for the past 2 years since transitioning to a bed. They rarely move around and have kept her feeling snug and cozy, and keep her sleep animals from falling out of bed. Easy to make a bed with. They're not easy to pack in a small space, but if you have room in your trunk they are lightweight and nice to bring when sleeping elsewhere (we tried the inflatable bumpers which never stayed put on the bed). I am excited to use these again when my next child moves to a bed. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RSG

customer_reviews.title: Work great with a little extra effort
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had these about a week. I bought them to use on my Dads medical bed because we couldn’t attach the usual rails and in the morning (after the first night he slept in it) we found him teetering on the very edge of the bed. They work very well to keep him centered in the bed. One bolster covers about 3/4 of the length of the extended length bed. They’re a little troublesome to place every night but they work great and make the extra effort worth it. Once we manage to get the rails attached they will be very useful to cushion them. It was a very good solution to our concern.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: My children have platform beds and I struggled with finding something that worked and wasn’t bulky. I decided to try these and I am very happy I did. They have grips on the bottom so they stay in place. I put my daughters underneath her mattress protector because it slipped a little bit due to the material of the mattress protector and once I did that it was perfect. With my son his mattress protector is a little more grippy so it works perfectly. Very pleased with the quality. I was skeptical based how they were package I left them to come to size for a couple hours and they were good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Foam Bed Rolls! Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! My daughter is 26 months old and needed to be in a big girl bed because she was climbing out of her crib and I thought she’d hurt herself climbing in and out. We put these on her twin bed, under her waterproof cover and sheet. Love that I’m able to hold her hand from the side of the bed while I wait for her to fall asleep. It’s really cuddly between the two foam rolls and she doesn’t fall out. No chemical smell at all, even when I first took them out of the box. Glad I purchased these instead of the traditional rails!
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Good, quality product
customer_reviews.text: We love this product. We bought the 2 pack for our son's bed as it is a full size bed that isn't sitting against a wall. They are good quality bumpers. There are nonskid bumps all along the bottom and 2 strips of no side bumps across the top. These help to hold the bumpers in place beautifully. We put our bumpers directly on the mattress and the waterproof mattress protector on top of that to help prevent them from getting anything on them. They do have a removable and washable outer cover just in case accidents do happen. Overall, we both love these bumpers and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Cat

customer_reviews.title: Very small not even close like how they show in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I would never get this again. Very small not even close like how they show in the picture!!! Waste of $$$$$
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful alternative to big bulky bed rails!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these - so much so that I bought them for my son's bed at my parents' house. The railings were so ugly and bulky, they made it so that he couldn't make the bed. I switched to the hiccapop Foam Bed Bumpers and it was SO easy to just unroll them, let them expand (only took about an hour and a half) then put under the sheets. Now we can make the bed, there aren't ugly giant rails to look at, and I can lay down in the bed and read with my son comfortably. HIGHLY recommend these. Customer service was amazing also. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: NGSpring

customer_reviews.title: They are just a bad idea. Poorly conceived. Not thought out fully.
customer_reviews.text: This is a super irritating product. What you don't think before you buy it is that your sheets were not made to have these big protrusions underneath them. you will completely stretch out a lot of your sheets to the point you have to throw them away and these bumpers will constantly slide out from underneath the sheet in your child will fall on the floor. If you don't have this issue then you probably don't need to Bumpers anyways. if your kid rolls around a lot at night these bumpers will not keep them in the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Lane W. Greer

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: No issues with odor or expansion from package, no slipping even with force, keeping my kids from rolling off their beds; however, I bought this for my 2 year olds toddler bed (converted from crib) and this product’s listing says it works for toddler beds - any bed in fact, and the warning on the instructions in the box reads “NEVER use on toddler bed...Use ONLY on adult bed.” It takes up the entire length of the toddler bed which must be a safety issue. So is working well on the twin size bed but very annoyed cannot use on the toddler bed which was why I bought this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely add to cart and buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bumpers! I wanted something to keep my little one securely in bed with me and these have worked perfectly. I have an adjustable base king size mattress so most of the bed rails wouldn't work for me since there isn't a box spring to attach it to. They fluff up nicely once out of the box and fit under the fitted sheet just fine. I love that I can sleep knowing she can't roll out of bed. Can't beat the price either! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Alberes

customer_reviews.title: Can Cause Injury!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old daughter fell out of her new big girl bed on the very first night using these!!! I feel like the worst mom ever for even trying them!! I heard a loud thud and then hysterical crying. She rolled right over this Hiccapop foam bed bumper! My other 2 children used the traditional style guard rails without any falls, and I’m going to buy those again. My daughter refuses to go in her big girl bed anymore because she’s afraid. Sorry I purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Moon

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design but fall off the bed easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I didn’t want large ugly rails showing all the time. The anti-slip grips on the bottom are not great as we keep having to put these back into place after they fall off the bed out from under the fitted sheet. My daughter likes to hug it while she sleeps. Keep in mind having two on both sides of a bed will significantly reduce the bed space left for sleeping. I wish maybe the two rails were connected with elastic or something so that they couldn’t fall off the bed. You need extra deep sheets also if you want them to fit the bed properly with these installed.
customer_reviews.author: Robin R

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to the bulky mesh bed rails.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to work great so far, just installed them last night. We ordered the 2 pack to put on each side of my 3 year olds new twin size bed. He’s a very active sleeper and I wanted something a little more comfortable than the regular mesh rail. They do slide a little, but no more than an inch back and forth. I have them on top of the waterproof mattress cover and under the bed sheet. Easy to install. Just unrolled and let them rise to shape, then just placed on the mattress. They are a kind of dense memory foam, not too soft that I think he’ll just roll right over it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: Love these bumpers!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had these on her bed for about 8 months and they haven’t failed us yet! I lay with her at night before she goes to sleep and these do not inhibit me from doing so like most of those tall rails do. These are soft and keep her in place. We started using them right she turned 2 years old. I gave 2 stars for traveling as I think I would be difficult to pack them up. I LOVE this product and recommend these bumpers to my mommy friends. I also love the name of them as it’s cute and easy to remember when recommending to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: JUNK - these bumpers look great in theory, but are total junk. They do not stay in place AT ALL. I've tried adding non slip on the bottom of them and double sided taping them to my daughters mattress and they are always hanging off the bed or on the floor the next morning. And, when they are in the bed, they take up a lot of room, her full size bed is essentially a twin. Total waste of $50!
customer_reviews.author: JMT

customer_reviews.title: Great for transition from crib
customer_reviews.text: My son who is almost 3 wasn't anxious to leave his crib, but his baby brother needed it. these bumpers gave him the feeling of security from his crib and he cuddles up to them. Preciously we had a gate type thing to keep our older son from rolling off, but switched to this because changing the sheets with the gate was a major ordeal and it kept falling loose. No problems with these little bumpers --he loves it and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: MissMare

customer_reviews.title: These Bumpers REALLY Work!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write my review until my child had slept in his bed for months. I am happy to say that these bumpers do the job!! He has not fallen out of bed once while using them. They are soft and flexible, yet stay in place. I am so happy I took a chance on these bumpers. They are so much better than the hard side frame bumpers.
customer_reviews.author: Charmed Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I read many of the reviews before purchasing this product because we needed something to make sure that our toddler would not fall out of her new "full" size bed. I am very happy with my purchase! I accommodated the bumpers the way that some other parents suggested, under the mattress protector. These foam bed bumpers stay in place all night, even when my child rolls over right next them. Thank you for this very innovative invention! I highly recommend this product to keep small children and even elderly adults, safe in their beds.
customer_reviews.author: RedButterfly

customer_reviews.title: SO EASY
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a metal bed frame and at first we bought the big bulky toddler bed gates that supposedly work with any bed frame type. Well that didn't work out. I was hesitant to try these because some of the reviews said they slipped off the bed easily or were not high enough. I AM SO GLAD WE BOUGHT THEM! They don't slip around at all and they are the perfect height for our almost 3 year old. Another bonus is that they are easy to travel with, so whenever we stay the night somewhere I bring them with me and feel better about sleeping wherever we go. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for 1 1/2 year old
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these for 2 month now. They came flat and needed to firm up and inflate on their own. I followed the instead it came with and they're perfect. They hold their shape, and havent weakened so far. They have grips on the bottom of the "rail" as well as a sheet thats attached and the child sleeps on top of to help keep it from slipping. They are not the length of the full mattress (which, it didn't need to be for us)
customer_reviews.author: Vonn

customer_reviews.title: Great product, kept sleeping toddler safe while traveling!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product!! Used for my toddler who sleeps like crazy all over the bed, kept her perfectly safe on a queen bed. Prevented her from rolling off. Is a great idea and purchase for travel and I’m sure you could also use this at home if you had a full or queen bed. Could potentially use for a twin, but takes a bit of space if you use two of them. Highly recommend this product, especially for traveling with kids and not having when roll off the bed.
customer_reviews.author: MelC

customer_reviews.title: Actually Works!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this behind my back without my consent for our 18 month old son. I didnt think it would work, but it does. It was an easy solution to my problem as my son has a king size bed and finding bed rails for a bed that size was impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Dbh

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these things. My 3 year old has a queen size bed in a corner, so we only need two bumpers. The one bumper fits at the bottom of the bed, the other one we have at the head of the bed, the long ways down so there is about a foot of space left without bumper, which is what he uses to get out of the bed. Would definitely by these again. When i fall asleep in his bed accidientally, they are very comforting to lay against. Breathable, cool, soft, gives me peace of mind and my son too!
customer_reviews.author: kaseyatbat

customer_reviews.title: Preferred over the gate option
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome alternative to the gate option. My LO will still wake up from time to time and need me to help settle him and this is so much easier to climb over/ deal with then a gate. Even with the anti slip they added, it will inevitably still move. I don’t find that my kid bothers it as much as I do getting in and out, so that’s what matters. Great product- would buy again and recommend
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good product but they do slide.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my toddler instead of regular side panels for his transition to the big boy bed. They worked well. They did slide off and he fell out of bed 2 times. I ended up putting one side under the mattress pad (where he usually leaned against it) and the other side on the mattress pad just under the fitted sheet and he did much better. We no longer use them as he stays put but we will use them for our daughter to transition when it’s time.
customer_reviews.author: Liz D

customer_reviews.title: Would get five stars, if they stayed in place.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great size, firm, yet soft. They do have a textured bottom to help stay in place. Unfortunately, they don't stay in place. They tend to push off the side while still staying under the fitted sheet. I push them back up and situated them each time my toddler sleeps. Fortunately, my toddler uses them like a mattress width extension and has not fallen out of bed. They do work nice between a bed and the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Calogero Gambino

customer_reviews.title: DON'T DELAY - GET THEM TODAY!
customer_reviews.text: BRILLIANT IDEA!!! Oh my goodness! I have a 22-month-old grandchild who occasionally spends the night. I've been stacking pillows up all around him ... this is SO MUCH BETTER! The little nubs on the bottom give it "grip" so it doesn't scoot around. And the size is perfect. If I did need to store then, that would be a snap as well and the fact that the covers can easily come off for washing, is yet another plus! I have already recommended these to my daughter to put in his big-boy bed when the time comes (very soon!) They just gave me TOTAL PEACE OF MIND! THANK YOU!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these bumpers for the past 3 months for my two year old. She has a full size bed that is relatively high up and she sleeps very wildly. She has not fell out of the bed with the proper use of this product. I love it because I can easily snuggle in her bed with her to read bedtime stories and exit her bed when she falls asleep without disturbing her rest. I am glad I purchased this instead of installing a bed rail. These bumpers are easy to install and remove. Worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hiccapop foam bed bumpers
customer_reviews.text: I only gave 4 stars because they've only been used a few times. These were bought to use for my granddaughter when she stays at grandparents house. She is also a very restless sleeper. I also have to lay with her until she goes to sleep and I have rested up against these bumpers and so far they have stayed in place and not moved. I placed them under the sheet. She does have a crib which converted to a bed with a rail but she refuses to use the bed. So far I am very happy with this product and would buy again as she has stayed in the bed all night and seems to sleep very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping the baby from ROLLING off the bed, just not CRAWLING off the bed.
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Does shift around enough that it needs to be repositioned regularly. Will NOT keep a baby from crawling over it. C’mon...did you think you could leave your baby in the bed and just walk away? Pros: We use this for co-sleeping with our baby boy. Very effective in keeping a 10 month old wiggly baby (and even adults) from rolling off the bed during sleep. I’ve tested it myself and somehow the design just makes it difficult to roll over it. Installation is too easy; just stick it under the sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Space Unicorn

customer_reviews.title: Great bed bumpers
customer_reviews.text: These are working great to keep my 3yo in their new full size bed. They are not too bulky and there is plenty of room between them for both of us, and it is not difficult or awkward to get into and out of the bed. They did take longer than 2 hours to fully expand (a couple days) but they would still work ok only partially expanded. They only time they slide it get dislodged is when I am getting out of the bed, and I just put them back. They don't move from my child sleeping up against them. I have them under the sheet but above the mattress cover.
customer_reviews.author: hb

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! I tried the bedrails for my toddler and because of the way the bed is made they just wouldn’t work. These bumpers are perfect. They just slide under the fitted bottom sheet and they have some anti-slip material that prevents them from moving after I place them. Easy to make the bed. Never in the way. And they keep my toddler totally safe in her bed. Love love love them.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Not worth trying
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about these... I appreciate the length and that they're not metal. But I haven't been able to successfully use them because they just don't stay near the edge of the bed. They constantly slide in and the material has a weird smell, even with letting them air out overnight. The slip resistant materials that goes along the bed also smells and is a very hot material and makes it uncomfortable to sleep. Since these poof up out of the package, I won't be able to return them so I'll have to find a different purpose for them or donate them.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Falls

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! Thanks Hiccapop!
customer_reviews.text: I love Hiccapop! We have their bed rail, pack n play mattress, and now these bed bumpers. Everything they make is amazing quality and they seem like an awesome company. These bumpers are perfect! They definitely aren't going to slide, especially because of the long piece of fabric. Make sure you have stretchy sheets so they fit over the bumpers and mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Lysol

customer_reviews.title: Listen to other reviews. Doesn’t stay on
customer_reviews.text: I went ahead and purchased even though others were saying that it wouldn’t stay on the bed and I wish I would have listened. These are a great idea and love that they aren’t like the other giant plastic bumpers but like others said they do not stay on the bed. They work great to use when there is a gap between the wall and the bed only. Thank goodness boys are tough bc after 3 times falling outside the bed with these things on its time to buy something different.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Breland

customer_reviews.title: Product seems to have changed ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the same Hiccapop bumpers a couple of year ago for my daughter and they were fantastic! I purchased them again yesterday for my son and sadly they are much smaller than the previous version. I’m going to keep them bc I’m in a tight situation with a crib jumper so have to emergency switch to a big boy bed but I am not confident that this new version will keep him from rolling out of the bed
customer_reviews.author: jaime w conwell

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the bars from the past - you know you remember them!
customer_reviews.text: Got these because I hated my bar when I was a kid so I couldn’t do it to my child! These tuck in nice under the sheets and don’t seem to interfere with my kids when they sleep. The quality is good and doesn’t slip around the sheets like you think they would. The one drawback is when we take the sheets off to clean them the kids hit each other with them and they work pretty well as bats.
customer_reviews.author: AMM

customer_reviews.title: These things are great. I was skeptical at first because they came ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. I was skeptical at first because they came so compact and were super light but they expanded to full size very quickly. Our 2.5 year old kids used to fall out of bed a few times a week and they haven't fallen out once since. They also like to try to climb out of bed when we're trying to put them down and these have made that more challenging for them. It at least slows them down when they're intentionally climbing out and it seems to entirely stop them from accidentally rolling out.
customer_reviews.author: colin ernst

customer_reviews.title: Bumps that we all need and want 😊
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set, both for the sweet granddaughter. We have a set at our home for taking in the RV. So much easier to take camping than a port a crib. And can be used on any bed in our house if needed. Now the second set is at my son's home. They work great to keep wee ones from falling off the bed while sleeping. No need yet, but the cover can be laundered. Great idea that doesn't take up a bunch of room if you aren't using them. Very lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: K. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great bumpers for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: We bought these bumpers for our twin boys when we converted them from crib to toddler beds. They are so much better than the traditional rails. Kids do not fall out of bed with these and they are so easy to put under the sheets. They are also great for traveling. Whenever we go somewhere, we take these and put them in a big bed and don’t have to worry about our kids falling out. Highly recommend these for young kids.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Castle

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love!!!! This is a must if you have little ones who love around a lot in their sleep. I now don’t have to worry if they are going to fall off the side of their beds at night. Very easy to put in bed. Let it sit out for a little bit right after taking it out of the box so it can fully open. Great length and height. I have them on full beds and it is almost the full length of the bed. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Roxana Howell

customer_reviews.title: Grandmother's helper
customer_reviews.text: My five year old granddaughter has transitioned into a "big girl" bed in our home during weekend visits. Our guest bed is higher than her bed at home and the bumper system we purchased is just what was needed! She likes the "feel" of putting in all her baby dolls and her stuffed animal in bed with her without them falling to the floor. We find comfort that she is not tumbling out of bed to the floor. In fact, I made up the bed with the system in place - comforter and decorative pillows all in place. It's home and a comfort to all. I don't miss the unsightly rails.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Briggs Eagleton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! No rolling/falling out of bed!
customer_reviews.text: My twin 2 year old girls have been using these for 3 nights so far and they're not rolling/falling out of bed! We converted their cribs to toddler beds and installed the tiny toddler rail that we paid extra for when we bought the cribs 3 years ago. But the toddler rail doesn't even cover 1/3 of the length of the bed and so they were falling out of bed in the middle of the night. With these hiccapop bumpers they can climb into their toddler beds, right over the bumper, and everybody sleeps well. They like their new pillows and I like sleeping through the night. It's a win-win-win!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: These got to full height within a few hours of unpacking them. I put them under the mattress protector and they stay in place very well. I'm sensitive to the chemical smell of foam products but these had a minimal odor. I was a little nervous based on other reviews of not getting to the full height, slipping, and chemical smell but found none of this to be true!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect. I read all the reviews and there were a lot of negative ones that talked about the shape of the product. Either those people got defective products or they didn’t read the directions. I read the directions, which literally says “open box, open plastic, leave alone for 2 hours to allow the foam to expand.” After 2 hours I had two perfectly shaped bumpers that met the exact dimensions of the description. These are exactly that we needed. They must have upgraded the non-slip pads on the bottom too. They are different from the photos but appear to be upgraded.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. Great product and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Kinda big to travel with but if you can manage to press them and gold them down tightly then yeah it’s great for travel. But at home these are just a great product. We have baby hang out with us on the bed all the time. It’s great product we think and even though he can’t rill over it just yet we still keep our eyes on him at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for transitioning from crib to bed
customer_reviews.text: We put these on my daughter’s big girl bed when we switched her from the crib. They are perfect. She can’t roll over them, but she can climb into and out of bed. Highly recommend! Update: we’ve had these for a year now and still loving them. I just sent the link to a friend of mine for her grandkids. I’d tell anyone with toddlers to get this. I’ll be purchasing a second pair for our little one when he transitions from the crib.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie B. Reddoch

customer_reviews.title: They appear very effective
customer_reviews.text: These bumper rails appear to be just what I need for my twin grandsons. One of them plumped right up, is soft yet stiff enough to provide the barrier I'm looking for. The 2nd on didn't "fill out" as much, but I rolled it around and squeezed it, and ta da, it too is ready to use. The boys haven't used them yet,(reason for 4 stars) but I feel confident. I've had these on the beds for a couple months now. They've expanded quite nicely and prove very effective. EXCELLENT Purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: GREAT! I prefer these over the traditional bed rails.
customer_reviews.text: I debated about buying these or the traditional bed rails (which I have had before), and I am so glad I tried these. They are so easy to use and put in place. It keeps both my 2 and 3 year old from falling out of their bed when sleeping, but also allows them to crawl over it to get out with ease. They also look really nice, rather than the cumbersome, obvious bed rails. I’m very happy with them and would definitely order them again.
customer_reviews.author: JJBees

customer_reviews.title: Bumpers are good but not as safe as expected
customer_reviews.text: I like the bumpers but my daughter did fall out of the bed the first night that she slept with them. My 2.5 year old is a wild sleeper and although she has a full size bed she still managed to tumble right over the top of the bumper. My other issue with the bumper is that it makes it difficult for the sheet to stay on the bed when they are in place. I under stand that they recommend that you buy deep sheets for the bed but it is quite difficult to find deep sheets in the prints that are kid friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Ebonizrainbow

customer_reviews.title: Great option for platform beds and travel,
customer_reviews.text: These bumpers are perfect for keeping your little one from rolling out of any bed. We have a platform bed (no boxspring) so the commonly seen rails were not an option. We tried surrounding him with pillows, but they took up so much of the bed and would fall off easily. These bumpers stay put under a fitted sheet, are high enough for him not to roll over top, take up minimal mattress space, and can easily be removed and taken to Grammys house for sleepovers. We couldn’t be happier with these bumpers!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Too easy to roll over
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had these for a few months now. At first, they seemed to work great on my son’s queen size platform bed. He wasn’t rolling out, the bumpers were easy to install, all well and good. However, in the past week, he’s fallen out twice. He’s 3, and likes to throw limbs over pillows, stuffies, my face...So, he’s clearly begun throwing legs and arms over the bumper, turning over, and falling right out. For some sleepers, these may work just fine. But for my crazy sleeper, I’ll need to buy a mesh rail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: They have been in the bed for weeks and we’ve never had to readjust them. They stay put and keep our daughter from falling out of bed. They look much better than bed rails, make it easier for adults to get in and out of bed, and keep the little one feeling tucked in. We’re even considering buying for our son who rolls around a lot to keep him from waking up when he falls out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of My Best Purchases!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Hiccapop foam bed bumpers when we transitioned our 2 year old son from a crib in our room to a twin bed in his room. My son instantly liked the bumpers; I believe he thinks they are a fort or something - smile. The bumpers are of high quality and water resistant, which is appreciated as he has spilled bottles or had accidents a few times. Because the bumpers are light weight and portable, they can be taken for extended travel. We've used the bumpers a few months now and they continue to be worth the price paid. I highly endorse the Hiccapop foam bed bumpers!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn E.

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: I have these in all of the bedrooms. The toddlers beds are on the floor and these help them from falling off. I use them at the top of our king size bed to fill the gap between our bed and the wall/frame so my pillow, glasses, etc don’t fall behind the bed. The older kids like them for their bunk beds edges.
customer_reviews.author: zipadee30

customer_reviews.title: The covering IS NOT WATERPROOF!
customer_reviews.text: Not water proof and not water resistant. Grandson potty trained and wears overnight pull ups. First night accident occurs and new mattress is wet through double coverings. I would have placed a waterproof pad on the bed, but i saw no need, as the description said "waterproof". The foam rails work fine, but thats all i needed. At less cost minus "waterproof" covering.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to make sure our wild sleepers stayed in their beds at night! We didn't want a clunky bedrail and had some friends suggest these. Fit snugly under the sheets and stays put. Fits under a normal sheet without a problem. Loved that it had a waterproof (yet not crinkly) cover. We are still new to the product but so far so good! Will update with any further feedback if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: ebann39

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I needed. My granddaughter needed to move from a crib to a double bed when staying over at our house, but at 3 years old wasn't ready to do that all at once without some added safety. These are just enough to be a gentle reminder through the night that she's reached the limit of the bed, but not so constraining that she can't get out over them once she's awake. We use them under the fitted sheet, so they stay where they're put without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Product that was Needed in the Market
customer_reviews.text: This product is the solution that was needed as an alternative to those ugly rails. Today is night for for my squirmy 2 year old and he hasn’t fallen once , he really is snug in his bed and protected with these great bumpers. I laid them on the mattress after inflating for 4 hours, put a mattress protector on top to secure them and then the sheet. 5 star product!
customer_reviews.author: Gab

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler bed trainjng
customer_reviews.text: Great product to keep on hand for when the toddlers come in town. Our nephew is right between cribs and a big boy bed and these were perfect for putting on our guest twin bed so he wouldn’t roll since he’s not yet used to big boy bed sleeping. He had no issue with them and they stayed in place without adjustment for the entire week.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Seem to work great!
customer_reviews.text: Going on a week and these are great! Way better than bulky pillows piled on a side of the bed! They “inflated” themselves back into shape in an hour or two and they fit under both the mattress protector and fitted sheet perfectly. They haven’t slid around at all! My daughter seems to like them. And they have definitely kept her more centered in the bed. I will recommend these to friends. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Behrens

customer_reviews.title: Over Two Years of Use With No Problem
customer_reviews.text: I've had these bed bumpers for over two years and they have worked excellently. It is indeed a tight fit under the fitted sheets, however, we'd made them work. My now 6 year old has been using them since he was 3 and now I'm back to order more for my 2 year old. I hope that they are still the same.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Kay

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The bumpers aren't as big as they seem on the product photo but I guess it depends on that bed size and what not. I have a king bed with pretty fitted sheets. I bought then for my 8month old that like to sleep a little crazy. It does the job for when she's sleeping but she can easily climb over them if I let her. But it serves its purpose for what I wanted. I let them sit out for 2 days before sticking them under my sheets. Overall very happy! I suggest getting bigger sheets!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution to Keep the Kids Safe in Bed
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these! They came in little boxes which the kids thought was hilarious once we pulled the bumpers out. We bought them to use for our three young kids on their bunks in the camper. They fit nicely under the sheets and they have rubbery bottoms so they don’t move around. They occasionally slip around but really I’m sure it’s because our kids are such wild sleepers. So far, they’ve kept them snug up in the beds without any accidents of rolling out which is all that matters! Nice bonus: the cover zips off for easy washing! Reasonable price and good product. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Grips well
customer_reviews.text: I put one on the bed under the fitted sheet in the morning before my grandson arrives. Then we nap together after lunch. I slip out of bed and slide the 2 nd bumper under the duvet cover. It stays in place nicely. I watch him sleep on the camera and they keep him nicely in a safe spot on my bed. Very nice product. Stays in place in 2 ways and I feel reassured he won’t get hurt in my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Reader1

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it is supposed to. I didn’t want to have panels to keep my kid in bed because they are hideous and could potentially cause harm by kid fingers getting caught in it. These are sturdy, made well, and serve the purpose. We have a 10in mattress with fitted sheets and they fit nice and snug underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Of 2

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for an active sleeper!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. We have an active sleeper, and I was worried about her transitioning. I don't like the bed rails because it makes it impossible to make the bed, These sit up high enough, and she hasn't fallen out of the bed yet! They are also rubberized on the bottom so they don't slip around!
customer_reviews.author: B. Sestito

customer_reviews.title: No issues transitioning to bed from crib with these
customer_reviews.text: Both bumpers inflated almost immediately without issue. These fit really well on a queen been but would also work on smaller beds. My toddler has slept in his new bed for four days (naps) and nights without falling off the bed. He moves a lot during the night as well sometimes turning all the way around and stays within the bumpers. He is 18 months and can climb over these and off the bed without a frame without struggling. The standard sheets are tight but still fit just fine over these bumpers.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay in place
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son as he transitioned into a “big boy” bed but the foam bed bumper didn’t stay in place for him. He moves around quite a bit during his sleep so ends up kicking them around. Using tighter sheets helps some but might not be the best for kiddos who are super active in their sleep.
customer_reviews.author: LSW

customer_reviews.title: Better solution bumpers
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using these bumpers for almost a year now. Works well for my daughter in her bed. Bumpers do slide around on the mattress but we’ve never had a problem since we push it in so there is a buffer from the edge of the bed. We think this is a better solution to keep our kids from rolling off the bed at night than the other ones we’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Sun

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy to use bed rails!
customer_reviews.text: We used traditional bed rails for years with our first kids. But we needed to do something new for our son because his bed couldn’t accommodate regular rails. We’ve been using these for a week now and they are perfect. They’ve stayed in place, aren’t obtrusive, and easily fit under the sheets. I’m excited that the covers can be washed when necessary as well. I would recommend these to anyone looking for an alternative to a bulky bed rail.
customer_reviews.author: kem003

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these don't live up to the description. They don't expand to the full 4.5 inches and have creases like crazy that just stay flat so back they go. I ended up just rolling up a thick blanket and used that instead and it serves the intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We love these bumpers! Great value, fluffed up to size quickly and didnt have a strong odor at all! The only negative is they do slide a little on my daughter's mattress but only when she uses them to pull herself up but on my sons mattress they stay just fine. Very comfortable and makes my kids feel secure
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My daughter hasn’t fallen out of her big girl bed yet. Inflated well in about two hours. I washed the covers right away and they washed well. My only thing is if your going to use them on a twin bed the extra fabric flaps you have to fold. But the function is still good.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Timm

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as our toddler son made the transition into his "big boy bed." They've worked out great! They provide enough barrier that even if he sleeps up against them, he's never rolled past them off of the bed. We've been using them for about three weeks now, and they've stayed in place well, and are easy to place when we change the sheets. Overall we're very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE These!!!
customer_reviews.text: A friend of ours had them for her toddler's bed and she loved them, so we decided to buy them when we transitioned our little one from a crib to a twin bed. They are SO SOFT, YET STURDY and she's safely cocooned in her bed with no risk of falling out. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our twins and they have worked well. We bought deep sheets because we thought we would need the extra room, but we didn't, so these do move a little bit. Buy regular sheets so the fit is tighter and they don't move so much. The kids use these on their beds every night, but we also took them with us when we traveled (by car). They're not quite so bulky that you can't bring them with you on a road trip for an unfamiliar bed situation.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: So much easier than rails
customer_reviews.text: Received these promptly and used them the same night. I had been fussing with rails that were put up for my grandson when he spent the night and taken down for company. This was so much trouble. I used the hiccapop Bumpers and it was so easy to put them under the sheet and then remove them. My little one slept just fine and did not fall out of the bed. Can't wait to take them with us to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Does not work. They don’t stay in place
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with this product at all.. I have a bumper on side of my daughters bed and at the end. One side of the bed is against a wall. The side bumper slips everyday to the side or the bed. It DOES NOT stay in place. Last night st 4 am my daughter fell out of bed and hurt her head. The bumper did not help her at all. She is 2 years old so her weight does not move the bumper. They just don’t stay in place. Very upset and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.text: We love these bed bummers. They work great. Our little girl loves them. So loves to cuddle them and even use them as an extra pillow. They make the bed seem a little smaller but my daughter loves that. Definitely glad we got these over the railing type.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: It's only been a couple weeks, but I feel that this is a very good product. We had pillows piled up on one side of the bed for our daughter to act as a bumper which took up a lot of bed "real estate". The bumpers added nearly a foot more bed for her comfort, as well as being able to throw a leg over them, as they are very soft, no bad smell and stay on the bed very well. All in all, we are very happy with the product and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The bumper fits great on the bed. Since I put it on the bed, my granddaughter has only slept over one time. I think it will work great, but I was a little nervous since this was the first time she slept in the big girl bed so after a few hours, I ended up sleeping with her. I like the product and I think it is going to work great just got to get over the grammy nerves.
customer_reviews.author: Arie B. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous having to move our daughter that had just turned two to a big girl bed - she was evicted from her crib by her baby brother. These have been SO wonderful for her! They stay in place once you put them down and have kept her from falling out of her bed. I was shocked how well they worked since she would turn circles all night in her crib. I will definitely be buying these when it’s time for my son to move up to his big boy bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Keeping the bumper in place....amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: What a life saver! We have had to turn an ordinary room into a hospital room at home. I couldn’t stand the hospital bed so I got her a comfy adjustable bed and use these bumpers instead of rails. She is a restless adult so we had some issue with it falling off the side but I folded a draw sheet and tucked the bumper in he fold so the weight of a person on the folded sheet keeps the bumper snugly in place. In a future model I’d suggest a fabric flap that could span the width of the bed to hold it but my solution works great!
customer_reviews.author: R. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. With the kind of bed we have (where the mattress sits inside the wooden slats for the bed, a traditional plastic/mesh rail wouldn’t work. I was hoping these would be ok and I love them. No movement, they quickly air up and the basic twin sheets easily accommodate them. Best purchase for the bed yet!!
customer_reviews.author: James M McAmis

customer_reviews.title: They work!  Without the hassle of bed rails!
customer_reviews.text: Had mixed feelings about ordering because other comments said they slip/move with wild sleepers but we haven't had that issue. We do have a "fabric" waterproof mattress cover on the bed we use these on so maybe that helps. Only issue I have is one of the bumpers came in about 3-4 inches shorter than the other. Not a big deal because it still works as intended but might want to work on consistent sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Bulky and Slides off UNSAFE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a twin size bed as we were transitioning our toddler. I have tried putting this directly on the mattress, on the mattress protector, and even under 2 sets of sheets and I can’t get this thing to stay put. My son fell off the bed twice while using this product and I am super unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Overall I can say I am satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: Overall I can say I am satisfied with this product. One zipper has started to break on back without me ever touching it. We needed to have a decent size fitted sheet to hold them in. I had bought some kid truck sheets for my sons bed on the cheaper side and they were not big enough to get around bumper and tuck into mattress. The sheets we have on there now work perfect and now there is no sliding out of the bumpers. My son doesn't move around too much so I can't speak to them stopping him from rolling out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn Gallo
